Transcription for 1268576

Because you're mine, the brightest star I see, the longest star I love and then meet me.
Because you're mine, because you're mine, because you're mine,
the breeze I'm used to I become the melody. And why? Because you're mine, because you're mine.
I only know for as long as I live, I'll only wait for the kiss that you alone may give me.
And when we kiss, that isn't unbelievable, it's only my heart you hear, and it's the bruised, the hurt you're mine.
